channel.title: Japan on The Zombie Fridge Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Japan on The Zombie Fridge Journal

item.title: US, South Korea, and Japan agree to increase defense, economic cooperation at summit
item.description: Aug. 21 (ZFJ) — President Joe Biden, South Korea’s President Yoon Suk Yeol, and Japan’s Prime Minister Fumio Kishida agreed to increase defense and economic cooperation among their countries at a Camp David summit on Friday, Aug. 18. This meeting is the first-ever standalone summit between the leaders of Japan, South Korea, and the United States. Japan and South Korea continue to have disputes over former Imperial Japan’s colonial rule from 1910-1945.
